item.title: Changing Things name (HELP PLZZ}
item.dc:creator: @xone xone
item.description:
@xone wrote:

I stopped at wipe.

But then I continued because you obviously need help.

What I do to edit item names is edit them with Textpad. Google it or I think the website is www.textpad.com.

Once you have it downloaded, go to your server folder. Right click on items.cfg and click textpad. Press f5 and enter in 4151 . If it says it can’t find the literal string, then just scroll down until you’re in the general area. It should say something like ‘abyssal_whip’ or something like that. Change that to whatever you want, but make sure that the spaces are separated by underscores _

Read full topic
